results.title: That midnight kiss
results.creator_credit: Norman Taurog, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: An opera singer (Kathryn Grayson) would like to have a tenor who looks the part of the tenor role. When Lanza, a singing truck driver is discovered, she gets her wish - and a happy ending isn’t far away. Cast also includes Jose Iturbi, Ethel Barrymore, Keenan Wynn, J. Carrol Naish, Thomas Gomez.

results.title: The Merry widow
results.creator_credit: Curtis Bernhardt, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Based on the operetta by Franz Lehar, libretto by Victor Leon and Leo Stein, this film adaptation stars Lana Turner as the “merry widow” supported by Thomas Gomez as the King of Marshovia and Fernando Lamas as the young Count Danilo. Oscar nominated for Best Art Direction/Set Decoration and Best Costumes. Cast also includes Una Merkel, Richard Haydn.

results.title: The Unfinished Dance
results.creator_credit: Henry Koster, Joe Pasternak and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Aspirational young ballet dancer refuses to let anything or anyone get in her way to becoming a prima ballerina. Cast includes Margaret O’Brien, Cyd Charisse, Karin Booth, Esther Dale, Thurston hall, harry hayden, Danny Thomas.

results.title: The Hollywood Revue of 1929
results.brief_description: Hosted by Conrad Nagel and Jack Benny this film features many of the MGM contracted stars and performers in an all-out musical comedy revue staged in Hollywood in 1929. Includes such luminaries as Joan Crawford, Laurel and Hardy, John Gilbert, Norma Shearer, Buster Keaton, and Marie Dressler.

results.title: The Wings of eagles
results.creator_credit: John Ford, Charles Schnee and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: The story is based on the life of Spig Wead, a pioneer aviator, renowned screenwriter. He scripted two of Ford’s films and was a personal friend. Spig is unable to combine his career and marriage. The exuberance of the early scenes of inter-service rivalry and the pursuit of glory rings hollow in what is basically an unattractive portrait of military life. Following the breakdown of his marriage and a crippling accident, Wead is overtaken by a profound sense of failure and loss. Cast includes John Wayne, Dan Dailey, Maureen O’Hara, Ward Bond.

results.title: Northwest passage
results.creator_credit: King Vidor, Hunt Stromberg, Loew's Inc and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: An American historical drama about a group of settlers known as Rogers’ Rangers - led by Major Rogers (Spencer Tracy) - and the hardships of survival and battles with hostile Indians, they encounter in trying to settle the upper New York state area for their families in the late 1750s and early 1760s. Based on the novel “Roger’s rangers” by Kenneth Roberts. Cast includes Robert Young, Walter Brennan. Ruth Hussey.

results.title: The Green years
results.creator_credit: Victor Saville, Leon Gordon and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Coming of age story starring a young Dean Stockwell, ‘The Green Years’ traces the formative years of an Irish boy sent to live with his draconian maternal Scottish grandparents. A reclusive, introspective child, Robert forms an attachment to his roguish great-grandfather, who draws the youngster out of his shell with his raucous ways. The film follows Robert into adulthood where he yearns for a career in the sciences, but is thwarted by lack of financial resources; he also falls in love. A sentimental drama, ‘The Green Years’ draws on Scottish and Irish culture as a backdrop to its central narrative quandaries. Cast also includes Charles Coburn, Tom Drake, Beverley Tyler, Hume Cronyn, Gladys Cooper, Jessica Tandy. Based on the novel by A.J. Cronin.

results.title: Day of the evil gun
results.brief_description: When Forbes’ (Arthur Kennedy) family is kidnapped by Apache Indians he enlists the help of his gun-slinging neighbour Warfield (Glenn Ford) and a scout called Jimmy Noble (Dean jagger) in a rescue bid to get his family back. What follows is a sequence of events that will change the personalities of each of the men leading to an eventual showdown. Cast also includes John Anderson, Harry Dean Stanton, Paul Fix, Nico Minardos.

results.title: The Cabin in the cotton
results.creator_credit: Michael Curtiz, First National Pictures and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: A tenant share-cropper is befriended by a southern plantation owner. He finds himself torn between loyalty to his class and an obligation to their enemy who is also his benefactor. Cast includes Richard Barthelmess, Dorothy Jordan, Bette Davis, hardie Albright, David Landau. Based on the novel by Harry Harrison Kroll.

results.title: Bathing beauty
results.creator_credit: George Sidney, Jack Cummings and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: A romantic musical comedy set in a girls college, mainly around the swimming pool, where the beautiful Esther Williams plays the role of a swimming instructor and Red Skelton stars as her lovesick, abandoned husband. A perfect setting for some stunning choreographed underwater performances by Esther Williams. Cast also includes Basil Rathbone, Bill Goodwin, Xavier Cugat, Ethel Smith, and featuring Harry James and his Orchestra.
